thread.title: Jose Darega
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Jose Darega

author: Jose Darega
title: Jose Darega
text:
Some of the deals are fantastic. Mad Max and Shadow of Mordor GOTY for 4 pounds each is insane. There are also some bundles from time to time.
However these seem to be the only worthy deals pretty much on each sale. Please try to add some more deals like these if possible. The bundles seem to be very similar too. (same games on different bundles)
